ValidationRule.description: For OTR with billing cycle "Twice per week" and payment method "Auto Pay Only", don't allow Credit Line Requested more than $1500
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (AND(Credit_Line_Requested__c > 1500)&& ISPICKVAL(Billing_Cycle__c, 'Twice per Week')&& ISPICKVAL(Payment_Method__c, 'Auto Pay Only') && ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c, 'OTR'))
